sen.j: 桜井家（さくらいけ）は、羽林家の家格を有する公家。
sen.e: The Sakurai family was a court noble family with the family rank of Urinke.
The Sakurai family was a court noble family with the family rank of Urinke.
The Sakurai family was a court noble family with the family rank of Urinke.
The Minase family line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
They fell under the Minase family line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
They fell under the Minase family line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 江戸時代の家禄は蔵米30俵3人扶持。
sen.e: The hereditary stipend during the Edo period was 30 hyo 3 fuchi in warehouse rice.
The hereditary stipend during the Edo period was thrity hyo three fuchi in warehouse rice.
The hereditary stipend during the Edo period was thirty hyo three fuchi in warehouse rice.
After the Meiji Restoration, the family held the title of ｖiscount.
After the Meiji Restoration, the family held the title of ｖiscount.
After the Meiji Restoration, the family held the title of viscount.

sen.j: 江戸時代に水無瀬兼俊の子・桜井兼里によって設立された。
sen.e: During the Edo period, the Sakurai family was founded by Kanesato, a son of Kanetoshi MINASE.
During the Edo period, the Sakurai family was founded by Kanesato, the son of Kanetoshi MINASE.
During the Edo period, the Sakurai family was founded by Kanesato, the son of Kanetoshi MINASE.
The highest attainable position was the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards.
The highest position attained was the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards.
The highest position attained was the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards.

sen.j: 江戸時代中期の桜井氏福が竹内式部に師事していたために宝暦事件に連座した。
sen.e: In the mid-Edo period, Ujiyoshi SAKURAI studied under TAKENOUCHI Shikibu and was implicated in the Horeki Incident.
During the mid-Edo period, Ujiyoshi SAKURAI studied under TAKENOUCHI Shikibu and was implicated in the Horeki Incident.
During the mid-Edo period, Ujiyoshi SAKURAI studied under TAKENOUCHI Shikibu and was implicated in the Horeki Incident.

sen.j: この時家名断絶の危機に陥るが、実弟の桜井供敦を養子として家督を継ぐ事が許された。
sen.e: Due to the incident, the line of the family was highly possible to become extinct, but Tomoatsu SAKURAI, a biological younger brother of Ujiyoshi SAKURAI was allowed to inherit the family.
Due to this incident, the family line had a high possible of becoming extinct, but Tomoatsu SAKURAI, the biological younger brother of Ujiyoshi SAKURAI was allowed to inherit the family.
Due to this incident, the family line had a high possible of becoming extinct, but Tomoatsu SAKURAI, the biological younger brother of Ujiyoshi SAKURAI was allowed to inherit the family.

sen.j: 明治維新に氏福の罪が許されて正四位が追贈され、1884年7月8日桜井供義に子爵の位を授けられた。
sen.e: At the Meiji Restoration, Ujiyoshi was pardoned and conferred Shoshii (Senior Fourth Rank) posthumously, and in September 8, 1884, the title of viscount was bestowed upon Tomoatsu SAKURAI.
During the Meiji Restoration, Ujiyoshi was pardoned and conferred Shoshii (Senior Fourth Rank) posthumously, and on September 8, 1884, the title of viscount was bestowed upon Tomoatsu SAKURAI.
During the Meiji Restoration, Ujiyoshi was pardoned and conferred Shoshii (Senior Fourth Rank) posthumously, and on July 8, 1884, the title of viscount was bestowed upon Tomoatsu SAKURAI.
